name: Happy Birthday Mart
description: Have you ever had a dream about your own shop where you are selling the goods to your friends? You can make that dream come true in Happy Birthday Mart...and it is not just an ordinary store. Animals come here to to buy gifts for their friends. The store must be looked after though. Manage and serve your customers, clean up, and fix broken shelves. Happy Birthday Mart offers you tons of fun in six different stores with 12 animals and 24 minigames. You can play the minigames through a separate menu screen.
